鉅.definition: (literary) hard iron; (literary) hook; barb; used in personal names and place names; variant of 巨[ju4]

鉅子.definition: (Mohism) master; leader (variant of 鉅子|巨子[ju4zi3])

鉅惠.definition: big discount (The nonstandard simplified form 钜 is commonly used for this word in advertising instead of 巨[ju4].)
